channel.title: Diary of a Coder
channel.description: Recent content on Diary of a Coder

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God; 2 Cor 3:5 Hi, I am tonnerkiller: Father, homemaker, unemployed minister and since recently a learner of coding through means of the freecodecamp.org curriculum. I read a lot about how documenting one’s path as a student of programming helps in progress, so I thought, why not start that? So I installed hugo and set up a github user page to get started.
